LanguageData.HaulingRobot_RechargeStation.label: Hauler Base Station
LanguageData.HaulingRobot_RechargeStation.description: This station comes equipped with a specialized robot.
LanguageData.HaulingRobot.description: This is a hauling robot. It carries your purchases home and even lifts your new piano up into your room on the 20th floor.
LanguageData.HaulingRobot_disabled.label: HaulingBot (disabled)
LanguageData.HaulingRobot_disabled.description: This is the sad end of a bot. It's no longer useful and needs heavy repairs or dismantling.
